/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/busca_gpu.dir/busca_gpu_generated_busca_local.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/busca_gpu.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
